successes.title: Planetary Annihilation - A Next Generation RTS
successes.description: Planetary Annihilation brings RTS gameplay to a new generation of players in a way that's never been seen before.

Pledges.description: The finished game on PC or Mac and an exclusive wallpaper for the Kickstarter introductory price of just $20!
Early access to the Beta, a copy of the digital game soundtrack, and access to the private discussion community. Includes all previous tiers.
You get the limited edition "Progenitor" Commander.  This in-game commander has a unique model that shows off your early support of this game. Includes all previous tiers.

Boosting mass is expensive! Join the battle as an alpha commander without the hassle of physical goods. All of the digital items from the $100 tier including an alpha key and and the alpha commander. Includes all previous tiers.
Early bird discount of the $100 tier! Includes all previous tiers.

Special commemorative limited edition full size game box, PA backer T-shirt and a digital art book showcasing the units and concept art from PA.  In addition, special thanks in the in-game credits highlighting your contribution. You also get access to the game at Alpha stage. Includes all previous tiers.
Please add $15 additional for international shipping.

This is a special tier created for those who don’t want any of the physical goods but still want the naming rights. This includes everything in the $90 tier. Every procedurally generated planet needs a name and if you contribute you’ll be immortalized by being among the list of those Uber enough to have a planet named after them. Just to be clear this tier includes no physical goods at all.

Kick it up a notch and join our planetary naming system. Every procedurally generated planet needs a name and if you contribute $150 you’ll be immortalized by being among the list of those uber enough to have a planet named after them. Includes all previous tiers.

Team signed limited edition Planetary Annihilation full size frameable poster, only available during the Kickstarter. A signed printed copy of the Art of PA book, that showcases the concepts and conceptual design of the game. And finally, the game box signed by the team! Includes all previous tiers.
Limited edition PA commander statue! These commanders are over 9” tall and very solid. Statue base signed by the development team.  Includes all previous tiers.

We create a custom unique commander just for you, that only you can play! Working with you, we'll design and conceive of the ideal commander to best represent you on the field of battle. You send us some source inspiration and we’ll make it look cool. Includes all previous tiers.

We name one of the units in the game after you. We can use a variation on your real name or your nickname. We’ll work with you to come up with an appropriate usage for your name and an appropriate design for the unit.  Includes all previous tiers.

Active engagement with the development team on an ongoing basis. Lunch at the Uber offices with the PA team, all game content going forward into the future free, permanent Uber VIP status. In addition, you are an Honorary member of the development team and will be credited as such. Includes all previous tiers.
